description: Prompts Claude to log a work summary before ending a session

hooks.prompt:
Decide if this session's work should be logged before stopping.

Respond `{}` to allow stop. Respond `{"decision":"block","reason":"Call mcp__ask-expert__summarize_work to log this work."}` to block.

Allow stop if: `stop_hook_active` is true, summarize_work was already called, the session was trivial, or it mainly used ask-expert query tools. Block only if meaningful work (code changes, decisions, debugging) was done and not yet summarized.
